summary: This document is an email chain between US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) prosecutors discussing internal case coordination. The emails focus on organizing a unit meeting, managing updates on specific teams like the 'Epstein team', and expressing frustration over delays, such as the drafting of a complaint that had not progressed for a month.

events.title: Discussion about drafting a complaint
events.description: A conversation occurred between the email author and IM about drafting a complaint, but no progress has been made in the subsequent month.

keyFacts: The communication is between prosecutors at the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS).
There is specific mention of an 'Epstein team' as a group that should provide updates.
The author expresses frustration that it has been a month since discussing the drafting of a complaint with IM, with no progress made.
